item.title: Bellgardt’s “Gremlin” draws posse back to deadCENTER
item.dc:creator: Brett Dickerson
item.description:
Emmy winning local filmmaker Ryan Bellgardt has a loyal following who will show up to see his next film just about every time. After his big hit Army of Frankensteins at the 2013 deadCENTER Film Festival in Oklahoma City, he is back with a more serious, dark movie that falls squarely in the “scary movie” […]

The post Bellgardt’s “Gremlin” draws posse back to deadCENTER appeared first on Oklahoma City Free Press.

item.title: deadCENTER crowd enjoys “The Scent of Rain & Lightning”
item.dc:creator: Brett Dickerson
item.description:
deadCENTER veterans Casey Twenter and Jeff Robison presented one of their latest serious works in the first night of the film festival in Oklahoma City, now in its 17th year. “The Scent of Rain & Lightning was adapted from the novel by Nancy Pickard, which was a new approach for the prolific writer/producer team. Already […]

The post deadCENTER crowd enjoys “The Scent of Rain & Lightning” appeared first on Oklahoma City Free Press.

item.title: Okla Cine Latino Film Festival reveals strong local talent
item.dc:creator: Brett Dickerson
item.description:
The third annual Cine Latino Film Festival entertained a filled UCO CHK Central Boathouse Saturday evening. It revealed the talents of many Oklahoma City filmmakers, actors and actresses. A new feature of the festival this year was the addition of work by local youth filmmakers, the product of workshops held weeks before. Organizers and those […]

The post Okla Cine Latino Film Festival reveals strong local talent appeared first on Oklahoma City Free Press.
